code: import React from"react";import Header from"./components/header";import Users from"./components/users";import AddUser from"./components/addUser";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const baseUrl="https://reqres.in/api/users?page=1";class App extends React.Component{constructor(props){axios.get(baseUrl).then(res=>{this.setState({users:res.data.data});});super(props);this.state={users:[]};this.removeUser=this.removeUser.bind(this);this.editUser=this.editUser.bind(this);this.addUser=this.addUser.bind(this);}render(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{title:"List of users:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"middle",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Users,{users:this.state.users,onDelete:this.removeUser,onEdit:this.editUser})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("aside",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddUser,{onAdd:this.addUser})})]})]});}editUser(user){let allUsers=this.state.users;allUsers[user.id-1]=user;this.setState({users:[]},()=>{this.setState({users:[...allUsers]});});}removeUser(id){this.setState({users:this.state.users.filter(el=>el.id!==id)});}addUser(user){const id=this.state.users.length+1;this.setState({users:[...this.state.users,{id,...user}]});}};export default App;
